item.title: 08 May 2021 05:49
item.description:
Earlier this week, I came across this nifty python tool that lets you backup all your garmin data from the Garmin-Connect platform. I wrote a crude WordPress plugin to parse the json files over and display the data on my website here. The tool is kind … https://t.co/yR5EQu3i7U

Link to Tweet
